text: Madhavrao I (Madhavrao Ballal Bhat; 15 February 1745 âˆ’18 November 1772) was the son of Peshwa Balaji Bajirao and grandson of Peshwa Bajirao I who served as 9th Peshwa of the Maratha Confederacy. During his tenure, the Maratha Confederacy recovered from the losses they suffered during the Third Battle of Panipat, an event known as Maratha Resurrection. == References == Category:Pages created with the Article Wizard from 2024 Category:India
title: Madhavrao I
